FuncDef: Whentacplus-map-to-priv-lvlis enabled, and tacplus authorization is enabled with theuse-priv-lvloption, typingenable-adminstarts an interactive authentication exchange from the node to the TACACS+ server. The start message (service=enable) contains the user-id and the requestedadmin-priv-lvl. Successful authentication results in the use of a new profile (as configured underconfig>system>security>tacplus>priv-lvl-map).
